changeLocale.title: Change Language
changeLocale.description: Select one of the languages below. Let us know if there is a language you would like to see added, translation issues, or recommendations. if there is a language you would like to see added, translation issues, or recommendations.

switchAccount.title: Switch Account
switchAccount.description: You have access to more than one account. Select account below to switch.

selectPet.title: Select Pet
selectPet.description: Select one of the pets below. The list below could be limited based on what the pet is being selected for.

editUser.title: Edit
editUser.description: Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet, consectetur adipiscing elit, sed do eiusmod tempor incididunt ut labore et dolore magna aliqua.

changePassword.saveSuccessMsg: Your password has been changed. Please Sign In with it.

editMapLocation.descriptionEdit: Press location of map to set location and provide a name for it.
editMapLocation.descriptionCreate: Your location and area around it is central to this app and the pawperty community. Click on the map to set your location and give it a friendly name

manageProfilePhoto.title: Manage Photo
manageProfilePhoto.description: The photo specified here is the primary image used for your pet on the site, lost/found report, and elsewhere. Please use an updated photo and ensure that it is able to be viewed as best possible.

livingStatus.title: Living Status
livingStatus.description: Keeping living status up to date allows to appropriate features for your pets. If your pet has passed, we are so sorry for your loss and share your pain.

locationStatus.title: Location Status
locationStatus.description: Let's leverage the community to help by getting the word out and working together.

selectDate.descriptionDate: Select date below and press 'Confirm' when ready.
selectDate.descriptionDateTime: Select date & time below and press 'Confirm' when ready.

quickActions.title: Quick Actions
quickActions.description: Common tasks and actions frequently performed by users.

actionLostMyPet.title: Lost my pet
actionLostMyPet.subTitle: My pet is lost & need help

actionFoundPet.title: Found a pet
actionFoundPet.subTitle: Found a pet & looking to return to family

actionAdoptPet.title: Adopt pet
actionAdoptPet.subTitle: Looking for a pet to adopt

actionSurrenderMyPet.title: Surrender pet
actionSurrenderMyPet.subTitle: Can no longer care for my pet

quickActionsPetContext.title: Quick Actions
quickActionsPetContext.description: Common tasks and actions frequently performed by users.

where.title: Where & When was pet last seen?
where.subTitle: Interact with map below and press the location where pet was lost.

petsFoundNearby.title: Is {{petName}} one of these {{animalTypePlural}} found?
petsFoundNearby.subTitle: Found reports for {{animalTypePlural}} that have been found recently within {{distanceFromLocation}} {{distanceMeasurement}} from the location identified.
petsFoundNearby.selectPetFromListInstructions: Select report below to view more information or press next if not in the list.
petsFoundNearby.mapNoPetMatchesUserLocatorMessage: If you want to see if {{petName}} was located outside of this distance, cancel this Lost Report and use the main Locator feature first. The Locator has an interactive map that can be zoomed out further as well as filters to indicate status (Lost and/or Found) and pet type (Dog, Cat, etc.).

reportDetails.title: Report Details & Contact
reportDetails.subTitle: Detailed description, additional pet details, and contact info that will be included in the report in addition to other managed pet details.

review.title: Review
review.subTitle: Review the information below and ensure it is accurate. If any of the pet details are not up to date, please update that first and then create the report. When review completed, press Publish to make it available to the community and notify others.

where.title: Where & When was pet found?
where.subTitle: Interact with map below and press the location where pet was found.

petsLostNearby.title: Is the {{animalType}} you found one of these reported lost?
petsLostNearby.subTitle: Lost reports for {{animalTypePlural}} that have been found recently within {{distanceFromLocation}} {{distanceMeasurement}} from the location identified.
petsLostNearby.selectPetFromListInstructions: Select report below to view more information or press next if not in the list.
petsLostNearby.mapNoPetMatchesUserLocatorMessage: If you want to see if {{petName}} was located outside of this distance, cancel this Lost Report and use the main Locator feature first. The Locator has an interactive map that can be zoomed out further as well as filters to indicate status (Lost and/or Found) and pet type (Dog, Cat, etc.).

questionChecklist.title: Pet Matching Features
questionChecklist.subTitle: We can attempt to match by ID, pet name, phone number, QR code, and even by photo.
questionChecklist.selectPetFromListInstructions: Select {{animalType}} below to view more information of reconnect with {{petName}}. If not in list click next.
questionChecklist.mapNoPetMatchesUserLocatorMessage: If you want to see if {{petName}} was located outside of this distance, cancel this Lost Report and use the main Locator feature first. The Locator has an interactive map that can be zoomed out further as well as filters to indicate status (Lost and/or Found) and pet type (Dog, Cat, etc.).

reportDetails.title: Pet Details, Report Details, Contact
reportDetails.subTitle: Add as much information as you can though most information is optional. Adding an image greatly increases odds of reuniting with family.

review.title: Review
review.subTitle: Review the information below and ensure it is accurate. If any of the pet details are not up to date, please update that first and then create the report. When review completed, press Publish to make it available to the community and notify others.

where.title: Where was the pet found?
where.subTitle: Interact with map below and press to indicate where was found.

reportDetails.title: Report Details - Pet & Contact
reportDetails.subTitle: Add as much information as you can though most information is optional. Adding an image greatly increases odds of reuniting with family.

review.title: Review
review.subTitle: Review the information below and ensure it is accurate. If any of the pet details are not up to date, please update that first and then create the report. When review completed, press Publish to make it available to the community and notify others.

slideRegistration.title: Registration
slideRegistration.subTitle: It all starts with your pets getting registered. Pet is issued a QR code and email. This unlocks all the features of pawperty and the community.

slideCommunity.title: Community
slideCommunity.subTitle: You and your registered pets automatically become a part of your local geographic community. Communities work together to help others with lost/found pets, adoptions, local services, and more.

slideRecords.title: Records, Reminders, more
slideRecords.subTitle: Keep track of your pets data like vaccinations, microchip info, registration, files, receipts. Set reminders for one-time or reoccurring medications, appointments, and more.

slideLocator.title: Pet Lost & Found
slideLocator.subTitle: We utilize all technology coupled with the local communities to help find lost pets or the home for found pets.

slideAdoption.title: Adoption & Transfer
slideAdoption.subTitle: We help connect pets with possible homes by connecting everyone better by working together. Allow for searching pets for adoption as well as finding home for pets that can no longer be kept.

slideServices.title: Services & Integration
slideServices.subTitle: Connect with local services that other pawperty users have used, rated, reviewed. Services include medical, sitting, food, care, pampering, and more.

landing.title: Lets get Started
landing.description: Welcome to the pawperty app and community. This service exists to enhance you and your pet(s) journey. We use a local community approach to further enrich the experience while leveraging the common love for pets to benefit all members.

choosePlan.title: Choose Plan
choosePlan.description: Standard Plan gives the best experience while providing revenue for us to keep this service up and building the features users are asking for without overbearing advertising. Please consider supporting our shared interest.

signUp.title: Sign Up123
signUp.description: Ensure you have access to the email provided below as Confirmation will be required in this process.
signUp.signUpComplete: Account created and Confirmation code sent to your email.

signUpConfirmation.title: Confirmation
signUpConfirmation.description: A Confirmation code was sent to the email provided. Enter that confirmation code below to continue.
signUpConfirmation.confirmationComplete: Confirmation complete. Let's Sign In and get started.

forgotPassword.title: Forgot Password?
forgotPassword.description: Enter the email associated to your account below. If the emails exists, you will receive a code and instructions required to reset your password.
forgotPassword.forgotPasswordComplete: Email sent if account exists. Check email for instructions.

setPassword.title: Set Password
setPassword.description: An email was sent with a Password reset code to the email entered if it exists for an account. Enter it below to reset your password.
setPassword.passwordResetCodeSent: Password Reset code sent to email
setPassword.setPasswordComplete: New password set. Let's Sign In and try it out.
